verses.text: Ix wak' pensar to ol in ya'ilej in b'eyb'al, yic max och in mul yuj tas swala'. Tzin yamoch waan in ti' yacb'an ayek' heb' anima chuk spensar t'a wichanh.
Ix in em numnajoc, majxo walpaxlaj wach' lolonel. Palta haxo in yaelal ix te nivtaji.
Vanxo stz'a in pixan ix wab'i. Yacb'an wan in te naub'tanhani, ix wach' och pitz'an t'a in pixan. Yuj chi' chaanh ix in awaji, ix walani:
Mamin Jehová, ak' wal wojtaquejeli to chamel b'a waji, to jayenhej ab'il in k 'inal. In gana snachajel wuuj to elanhchamel tzek'b'at in k 'inal.
Quennhej in k 'inal ix ak'a'. Manh niwanoclaj in k 'inal t'a ichanh. Ha onh anima onh tik, icha wal quik'an jab'oc quik', icha chi' ko k 'inal.
Icha wewen caj ko masanil. Nab'anhej sco mak' k'unb'oc ko b'a. ¿Tocwal skak' ko gana yet' ko b'eyumal sco molb'ejk'e b'ulan? Manh cojtacoc mach ol ik'ancanb'atoc.
Mamin Vajal, haxo ticnaik, ¿tas wach' swak'och yipoc in k'ool? Ha ach ton ayach och yipoc in k'ool.
Colinel t'a masanil in chukal. Manh in a cha b'uchjoc yuj heb' chuk spensar.
Icha wal heb' max ujilaj sloloni, icha chi' ix wutej in b'a. Manhxalaj tas ix elta t'a in ti', yujto a ach tik ix ak'och juntzanh tik t'ayin.
Ik'el in yaelal ix ak'ochi. Vanxo in lajwiel swab' yuj b'aj ix in a mak'a'.

Ha ach tzak'och ko yaelal a onh anima onh tik. Tzak'anoch ko tz'uumal yuj ko mul. Ha ach tzak' lajwoc tas nib'ab'il cuuj, ichato tz'ijaxb'ati. Co masanil, icha wal quik'an quik', icha chi' yek' ko k 'inal.

Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal tik, cotanh k'elan t'ayin ayic swalan in b'a t'ayach. Manh ak' sat a k'ool t'a yal in sat tik. Mamin, a t'ayach, ek'elb'anhej wek' t'a sat lu'um tik icha heb' in mam wicham.
Mamin, manh ak'cot a k'ak'alk'olal t'ayin, yic wach' tzin tzalaj junok rato, yacb'an manto el-laj in k'ool.
